refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GtkCList widget is a very useful multi-columned scrolling list. It can display data in nicely aligned vertical columns, with titles at the top of the list.

refsect2.title: struct GtkCList

warning.para: GtkCList is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This is the embodiment of the GtkCList widget. This structure contains only private data, and should be accessed only via the CList API.

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_row_data is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets data for the specified row. This is the same as calling gtk_clist_set_row_data_full(clist, row, data, NULL).

listitem.simpara: The data to set for the row.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_row_data_full ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_clist_set_row_data_full (GtkCList *clist, gint row, gpointer data, GtkDestroyNotify destroy);

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_row_data_full is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the data for specified row, with a callback when the row is destroyed.

listitem.simpara: The data to set for the row.
A GtkDestroyNotify function to be called when the row is destroyed.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_get_row_data ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_get_row_data is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the currently set data for the specified row.

listitem.simpara: The data set for the row.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_find_row_from_data ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_find_row_from_data is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Searches the CList for the row with the specified data.

listitem.simpara: The data to search for a match.
The number of the matching row, or -1 if no match could be found.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_select_row ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_select_row is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Selects the specified row. Causes the "select-row" signal to be emitted for the specified row and column.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_unselect_row ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_unselect_row is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Unselects the specified row. Causes the "unselect-row" signal to be emitted for the specified row and column.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_undo_selection ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_undo_selection is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Undoes the last selection for an "extended selection mode" CList.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_clear ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_clear is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Removes all the CList's rows.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_get_selection_info ()
refsect2.programlisting: gint gtk_clist_get_selection_info (GtkCList *clist, gint x, gint y, gint *row, gint *column);

warning.para: gtk_clist_get_selection_info is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the row and column at the specified pixel position in the CList.

listitem.simpara: The horizontal pixel position to check.
The vertical pixel position to check..
Pointer to a gint to store the row value.
Pointer to a gint to store the column value.
1 if row/column is returned and in range, 0 otherwise.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_select_all ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_select_all is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Selects all rows in the CList. This function has no affect for a CList in "single" or "browse" selection mode.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_unselect_all ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_unselect_all is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Unselects all rows in the CList.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_swap_rows ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_swap_rows is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Swaps the two specified rows with each other.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_compare_func ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_compare_func is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the compare function of the GtkClist to cmp_func. If cmp_func is NULL, then the default compare function is used. The default compare function sorts ascending or with the type set by gtk_clist_set_sort_type() by the column set by gtk_clist_set_sort_column().

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_sort_column ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_sort_column is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the sort column of the clist. The sort column is used by the default compare function to determine which column to sort by.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_sort_type ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_sort_type is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the sort type of the GtkClist. This is either GTK_SORT_ASCENDING for ascening sort or GTK_SORT_DESCENDING for descending sort.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_sort ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_sort is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sorts the GtkClist according to the current compare function, which can be set with the gtk_clist_set_compare_func() function.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_auto_sort ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_auto_sort is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Turns on or off auto sort of the GtkCList. If auto sort is on, then the CList will be resorted when a row is inserted into the CList.

listitem.simpara: whether auto sort should be on or off

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_columns_autosize ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_columns_autosize is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Auto-sizes all columns in the CList and returns the total width of the CList.

listitem.simpara: The total width of the CList.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_get_column_title ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_get_column_title is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the current title of the specified column

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_get_column_widget ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_get_column_widget is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the widget in the column header for the specified column.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GtkWidget for the column header.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_get_hadjustment ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_get_hadjustment is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the GtkAdjustment currently being used for the horizontal aspect.

listitem.simpara: A GtkAdjustment object, or NULL if none is currently being used.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_get_vadjustment ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_get_vadjustment is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the GtkAdjustment currently being used for the vertical aspect.

listitem.simpara: A GtkAdjustment object, or NULL if none is currently being used.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_row_move ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_row_move is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Allows you to move a row from one position to another in the list.

listitem.simpara: The original position of the row to move.
The position to which the row should be moved.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_button_actions ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_button_actions is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the action(s) that the specified mouse button will have on the CList.

listitem.simpara: The mouse button to set. The values here, unlike in the rest of GTK+ start from 0. For instance, the right mouse button, which is 3 elsewhere, should be given as 2 here.
A logically OR'd value of GtkButtonAction values for the button.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_hadjustment ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_hadjustment is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Allows you to set the GtkAdjustment to be used for the horizontal aspect of the GtkCList widget.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a GtkAdjustment widget, or NULL.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_reorderable ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_reorderable is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets whether the CList's rows are re-orderable using drag-and-drop.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_use_drag_icons ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_use_drag_icons is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Determines whether the GtkClist should use icons when doing drag-and-drop operations.

refsect2.title: gtk_clist_set_vadjustment ()

warning.para: gtk_clist_set_vadjustment is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Allows you to set the GtkAdjustment to be used for the vertical aspect of the GtkCList widget.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a GtkAdjustment widget, or NULL.

listitem.para: An integer value for a column.
A boolean value for determining if the user can re-order the CList's columns.

Sets the type of selection mode for the CList.
Sets the shadowing for the CList.
A boolean value for setting whether the column titles can be clicked.
A boolean value for setting whether to use icons during drag operations.
